title: Minecraft并不一定会登陆HoloLens
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2015-1-26 16:50 编辑 
啥？你说你没听说过这个说法？见此，见此。Jeb: I've tried 2 Minecraft projects on #HoloLens. One is a toy, one is closer to the game, both are awesome! Very much wip, but definitely real

Jeb：我已经在HoloLens（维基百科↗，百度百科↗）上尝试了两个有关Minecraft的项目了。一个是写着玩，另一个更接近一款游戏，两个都不错！看起来都只是雏形，但是挺真实。

Reddit上：
Jeb：额… 我什么时候说过“会登陆”了？ :) 我觉得把他们看成一个设想会更合适。
        玩家A：嗯，“挺真实”有点好像是在暗示他们会登陆这个平台，这个推测也说得过去。
                Jeb：啊哈，我懂了。我写了这两个项目是因为有些人不相信全息图像真的可行。（HoloLens）不像在广告里这么厉害，但是还是有效的。               （注意，Jeb在这里没说“只因为”）
        玩家B：你太恶趣味了，都不告诉我们其他东西。
                Jeb：嗯，我不知道有些话是不是能乱说 :|
注：HoloLens是微软的一个虚拟现实眼镜

Jeb: Sigh... When did I say "coming"? =) I think it's safer to regard them as prototypes.
        Murreey: Well "definitely real" kinda implies they're coming, but fair enough.
                Jeb: Aha, I see. I wrote that because people didn't believe the holograms actually worked. They don't work as in the advertisement video, but they work.
        Muhznit: You're such a tease, not telling us anything else!
                Jeb: Yeah, I'm not sure what I'm allowed to say :/
来源：
https://twitter.com/jeb_/status/557993513976344577
http://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/2t7gc0/jeb_on_twitter_two_minecraft_projects_coming_to/
